thread.title: Kinaxis Inc. to Host Third Quarter 2015 Investor Conference Call on October 29, 2015
thread.title_full: Kinaxis Inc. to Host Third Quarter 2015 Investor Conference Call on October 29, 2015

title: Kinaxis Inc. to Host Third Quarter 2015 Investor Conference Call on October 29, 2015
text:
Conference Call Announcements Kinaxis Inc. to Host Third Quarter 2015 Investor Conference Call on October 29, 2015 OTTAWA , Oct. 15, 2015 /CNW/ - Kinaxis Inc. (TSX:KXS) ("Kinaxis"), provider of RapidResponseÂ®, delivering cloud-based SCM and S&OP applications, today announced that it will hold a conference call to discuss the results for its third quarter ended September 30 , 2015. The call will be hosted by Doug Colbeth , CEO, and Richard Monkman , CFO on Thursday, October 29, 2015 at 8:00 a.m. (EST) followed by a question and answer period. All interested parties are invited to participate. The Company expects to report its financial results for the third quarter after the close of markets on October 28, 2015 . CONFERENCE CALL DETAILS: (613) 667-0035 (416) 849-0833 or 1 (855) 859-2056Available until 12:00 midnight (EST) Thursday November 5, 2015 Reference number: 52933750 Webcast will be archived for one year For more supply chain related news, follow Kinaxis on LinkedIn , Twitter , Google+ or Facebook . About Kinaxis Kinaxis is a leading provider of cloud-based subscription software that enables our customers to improve and accelerate analysis and decision-making across their supply chain operations. The supply chain planning and analytics capabilities of our product, RapidResponse , create the foundation for managing multiple, interconnected supply chain management processes . By using the single RapidResponse product instead of combining individual disparate software solutions, our customers gain visibility across their supply chains, can respond quickly to changing conditions, and ultimately realize significant operating efficiencies . 
For further information: Investor Relations: Robert Kelly, NATIONAL | Equicom, T: (416) 848-1382, rkelly@national.ca Release contains wide tables.
